name: Polynomial.cardinalMk_eq_max
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : Nontrivial R
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (Polynomial R)) (Max.max (Cardinal.mk R) Cardinal.aleph0)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem cardinalMk_eq_max {R : Type u} [Semiring R] [Nontrivial R] : #(R[X]) = max #R ℵ₀ :=
  (toFinsuppIso R).toEquiv.cardinal_eq.trans <| by
    rw [AddMonoidAlgebra, mk_finsupp_lift_of_infinite, lift_uzero, max_comm]
    rfl

name: Polynomial.cardinal_mk_eq_max
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝¹ : Semiring R
inst✝ : Nontrivial R
⊢ Eq (Cardinal.mk (Polynomial R)) (Max.max (Cardinal.mk R) Cardinal.aleph0)

name: Polynomial.cardinalMk_le_max
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝ : Semiring R
⊢ LE.le (Cardinal.mk (Polynomial R)) (Max.max (Cardinal.mk R) Cardinal.aleph0)
decl:
theorem cardinalMk_le_max {R : Type u} [Semiring R] : #(R[X]) ≤ max #R ℵ₀ := by
  cases subsingleton_or_nontrivial R
  · exact (mk_eq_one _).trans_le (le_max_of_le_right one_le_aleph0)
  · exact cardinalMk_eq_max.le

name: Polynomial.cardinal_mk_le_max
initialProofState:
R : Type u
inst✝ : Semiring R
⊢ LE.le (Cardinal.mk (Polynomial R)) (Max.max (Cardinal.mk R) Cardinal.aleph0)
